response.overview: Estranged from his father, college student Jake is lured home to New York for Christmas with the promise of receiving a classic Porsche as a gift. When the bullying football team dumps him in the desert in a Santa suit, Jake is left without identification or money to help him make the journey. Meanwhile, his girlfriend, Allie, does not know where he is, and accepts a cross-country ride from Jake's rival, Eddie.
response.tagline: Somewhere between L.A. and N.Y. Jake found the meaning of Christmas.
response.title: I'll Be Home for Christmas

titles.title: Vuelve a casa por Navidad, si puedes...

results.name: I'll Be Home For Christmas - Jessica Biel & Adam LaVorgna
